data_table.description: Siting Blood Pressure, Exam 1. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: SBPAFLAG
variable.description: SBPAFLAG [Siting Blood Pressure, exam 1]

variable.name: SBPACY
variable.description: Contact year [1] [Siting Blood Pressure, exam 1]

variable.name: SBPA01
variable.description: [Temperature] Room temperature (degrees centigrade). Q1 [Siting Blood Pressure, exam 1]

variable.name: SBPA02
variable.description: [Tobacco and caffeine]. Smoked or used chewing tobacco or snuff within the last 4 hours? Q2 [Siting Blood Pressure, exam 1]

variable.name: SBPA04
variable.description: [Tobacco and caffeine]. Any coffee, tea, or chocolate within the last 4 hours? Q4 [Siting Blood Pressure, exam 1]

variable.name: SBPA06
variable.description: [Preliminary measurement]. Right arm circumference (cm) Q6 [Siting Blood Pressure, exam 1]

variable.name: SBPA07
variable.description: [Preliminary measurement]. Cuff Size: Q7 [Siting Blood Pressure, exam 1]

variable.name: SBPA09
variable.description: [Preliminary measurement]. Pulse obliteration pressure. Q9 [Siting Blood Pressure, exam 1]

variable.name: SBPA10
variable.description: [Preliminary measurement]. Maximum zero. Q10 [Siting Blood Pressure, exam 1]

variable.name: SBPA11
variable.description: [Preliminary measurement]. Peak inflation level. Q11 [Siting Blood Pressure, exam 1]

variable.name: SBPA12
variable.description: [First blood pressure measurement]. 1st systolic. Q12 [Siting Blood Pressure, exam 1]

variable.name: SBPA13
variable.description: [First blood pressure measurement]. 1st diastolic. Q13 [Siting Blood Pressure, exam 1]

variable.name: SBPA14
variable.description: [First blood pressure measurement]. 1st zero reading. Q14 [Siting Blood Pressure, exam 1]

variable.name: SBPA15
variable.description: [Second blood pressure measurement]. 2nd systolic. Q15 [Siting Blood Pressure, exam 1]

variable.name: SBPA16
variable.description: [Second blood pressure measurement]. 2nd diastolic. Q16 [Siting Blood Pressure, exam 1]

variable.name: SBPA17
variable.description: [Second blood pressure measurement]. 2nd zero reading. Q17 [Siting Blood Pressure, exam 1]

variable.name: SBPA18
variable.description: [Third blood pressure measurement]. 3rd systolic. Q18 [Siting Blood Pressure, exam 1]

variable.name: SBPA19
variable.description: [Third blood pressure measurement]. 3rd diastolic. Q19 [Siting Blood Pressure, exam 1]

variable.name: SBPA20
variable.description: [Third blood pressure measurement]. 3rd zero reading. Q20 [Siting Blood Pressure, exam 1]

variable.name: SBPA21
variable.description: [Computed net average of second and third blood pressure measurement]. 2nd and 3rd systolic. Q21 [Siting Blood Pressure, exam 1]

variable.name: SBPA22
variable.description: [Third blood pressure measurement]. 2nd and 3rd diastolic. Q22 [Siting Blood Pressure, exam 1]

variable.name: SBPA24
variable.description: [Administration information]. Method of data collection. Q24 [Siting Blood Pressure, exam 1]

variable.name: SBPA03MN
variable.description: [Tobacco and caffeine]. Time in minutes since last use of tobacco [Siting Blood Pressure, exam 1]

variable.name: SBPA05MN
variable.description: [Tobacco and caffeine]. Time in minutes since last coffee, tea or chocolate [Siting Blood Pressure, exam 1]

variable.name: SBPA08HM
variable.description: [Preliminary measurement]. Time of day [Siting Blood Pressure, exam 1]

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID
